CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 22, reads: "Shopping Bags - Miss Cecelia Trower represented the Trower Tailoring Company for her father. With a delightful smile she passes out to each visitor a shopping bag which was soon filled with samples and literature from every exhibitor."
TitMainTitle: Cecelia Trower (Epperson) holding shopping bags, standing in Trower Tailoring Co. booth, in between House of Beauty Cosmetics and Pepsi-Cola booths, in Ammon Center for 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
